name: Goolems
description:
Join our heroic and completely sane wizard as he travels the globe in his magic castle, on a quest to convert the world to gooey goodness.

The Game


A 2D puzzle game where the objective is to guide your goolems using a limited number of special abilties. Objectives range from gooing all humans, charging mysterious altars, and even capturing rare legendary beasts.

Abilties


  • Dig - Up, down, left, right, whatever it takes to get round obstacles and suprise your new friends.
  • Fly, Leap and Fling - Attack from above for that tactical edge.
  • Spit - Gooey missiles infect water, put out fires, or make new friends from afar.
  • Spit Wires & Ninja Ropes - Swing, fly, or tiptoe across gooey tight ropes
  • Sneak - Ground breaking stealth mechanics... Hiding in barrels.

And more!

Spread the Goo!


Dig the earth to let water flow. Goo the water to make... more goo?

Crystals!
Collect magic crystals to unlock mysterious secret game modes.
